label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative description. This is the primary text used to document the item.

label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.description: Add citation information related to the publication

label.description: The ISBN number for the book.

label.description: How many pages there are in the book.
